title: A FAIR DEAL
guarantee: No matter how much of the Eclipse trial carton you smoke, you have our guarantee from the first pack in this carton to the last. So whatever you decide, it won't be at your expense.
request: All we ask is that you give Eclipse a good, fair try. A full week. The whole carton. A trial period that leaves you sure you've made the right call. Because Eclipse really is a better way to smoke whether you're concerned about secondhand smoke or many of the other issues you and other smokers face today.
refund_policy: That's our deal. If you feel that after giving Eclipse a good, fair try Eclipse is not right for you, simply call 1-800-708-7878 and we'll refund the full cost of your first carton of Eclipse. If you don't mind, we'd also like to briefly ask you about your experience with Eclipse.

questions.question: Did you read all the materials that were provided with your carton of Eclipse?
How did you usually light an Eclipse?
Did you have trouble lighting Eclipse?
How many puffs did it take before you could get Eclipse going?
Did Eclipse ever go out before it was finished?
Did you have a problem with 'scorching'? (Scorching turns the paper brown and causes an unpleasant taste. It comes from puffing too hard or too fast.)
How many cigarettes did you smoke from your carton?
Did you ever get 'used to' Eclipse?
Why were you interested in Eclipse? Please check any that apply.
Would you ever try Eclipse again?

surgeon_general_warning: SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Smoking Causes Lung Cancer, Heart Disease, Emphysema, And May Complicate Pregnancy
